title: Will I pass the 5th grade if I got 3 F's in math every semester? - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not completely sure because I am not a teacher but you have to ask yourself this. Would you be happy if you passed?I know what you are going through but if you are struggling with math don't be afraid to ask for help theres always someone around if it's not a teacher ask a classmate or an adult in your family I am sure you can find someone to help you. You can also ask your teacher if theres anything extra you can do to bring your grade up extra credit do anything you can to show you are trying. Try your hardest always and ask for help. Is ok to fail if you don't fail you wont succeed.

Yo, 5th grade math is common sense. What is wrong with you???????? Please please pLeAsE ask someone to help you. You’re gonna need it so bad. You really need to put in more work because concepts in 5th grade maths are just so basic that you need to be special not to understand them. SMH SMH SMH SMH SMH SMH….
